value.name: Chattanooga Cocaine Dealer Henry Bennett Arrested
value.description: The officer attempted to catch up to the vehicle to initiate a traffic stop, but the vehicle accelerated, turned into the Riverview Grande Apartments (formerly Mansion Hill) and eluded police.

value.name: Man Shot On Through Street Identifies Henry Bennett As One Of Gunmen
value.description: Terrick Thorne has been charged with the murder on Tuesday of a woman at East Lake Court. Police said it was found that Thorne had bought a gun hours earlier and the couple had been arguing

value.name: Waikato DHB slammed in coroner's report into death of mental health patient Nicky Stevens
value.description: In March 2015, the inpatient at Waikato’s Henry Bennett Centre went outside for a cigarette – and today the coroner confirmed Nicky committed suicide. Key findings from Coroner Wallace Bain ...

value.name: 'I'd give anything not to be here' - families bereaved by suicide discuss care for vulnerable Kiwis
value.description: It was organised by Jane Stevens, whose son Nicky died after leaving the Henry Bennett Centre where he was on suicide watch. "We've had so many families contact us," she says. "There's actually ...
